thread.section_title: The Piccadilly London West End - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Liddy158
title: Great hotel
text:
Stunning hotel. Fantastic location professional and polite staff.
Rooms were quiet although we were at the front of the building on the main road we heard no street noise at all. Thoroughly enjoyed our very brief stay. Just sorry that we couldn't try all the amenities there were in offer. Certainly recommend and look forward to a return stay
